Amal Al-Shammari

Amal Born and raised in Doha, in a big traditional family of Bedouin heritage. She earned her Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration from Qatar University 2011. Currently working as Head of Business Planning Department in an oil and gas company. She is also the founder of Embrace Doha and a member of Qatar Leadership center.

Gen

With over 10 years’ experience in internal/external relations communications management, Gieneve procures the ability to effectively manage information through people within and outside the organisation to support key business initiatives.

She as well is an enthusiastic person with extensive experience in event management, administrative, and human resources.

She works in a multicultural environment for the last 11 years, and is able to communicate company directives into simple scenarios at all levels within and across the different business sectors.
